Indebox

A middlehand between InDesign and Dropbox to make them work together

For better cooperation

Indebox is a small, almost invisible, app that will make your teams daily work easier.

It will make Dropbox and InDesign work together.

The issue

InDesign is a great tool. And so is Dropbox. But they don't work that great together, as you may have noticed.

If you sync InDesign-documents with Dropbox a disaster may occur if one of your collegues open the same document as you.

The solution

Indebox to the rescue!

Install Indebox and use it to open InDesign-files. And you won't event notice it, your work will just be better.

Download Indebox

Indebox requires OS X El Capitan, Dropbox and InDesign CC 2015

Read more about installation and usage here.

You seem to using a phone, and then you have no use of Indebox. Send notification to yourself so you can download it once you're by your computer.
